AD_LostGoods.synopsis: Lost goods and piles of valuables - sacks, chests, boxes, backpacks left behind by people dashing out to save their lives.
AD_LostGoods.how_to_trigger: SCL_Main_A104; 58; -23Talt to S_SCL_RuinedBattleground_LostGoods -  Pile of Sacks

AD_EmeraldEnclaveFallen.synopsis: There are number of pile of fallen withered skeletons in greenish armors of Emerald Enclave.They are remains from the past war with Ketheric and his Justiciars

AD_LostGoods_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_LostGoods_0.text: *A pile of belongings, forsaken to the curse so that their owners could escape with their lives.*

AD_EmeraldEnclaveFallen_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_EmeraldEnclaveFallen_0.text: *Fallen members of the Emerald Enclave. Casualties in the war against Ketheric Thorm, years past.*

AD_EmeraldEnclaveFallen_1.speaker: Narrator
AD_EmeraldEnclaveFallen_1.text: *The old remains sport green armour and garb. What banner did they march under?*
